attrs.name: page-only
attrs.desc: Display mode. The value true indicates that the web page is displayed in full screen mode, and the value false indicates that the browser is displayed in full screen mode. The default value is false

attrs.name: teleport
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to move the target element to the body. true: move; false: do not move. The default value is false

attrs.name: z-index
attrs.desc: ZIndex of the target element in full-screen display

attrs.name: fullscreen-class
attrs.desc: Style class name of the custom component wrapper

attrs.name: fullscreen
attrs.desc: Whether to display a component in full screen mode. The default value is false

attrs.name: exit-on-click-wrapper
attrs.desc: When the component is used in component mode, click the component wrapper to determine whether to disable full-screen display. The default value is true.

slots.name: default
slots.desc: User-defined content. Slots must be listed in the layout.

methods.name: toggle
methods.desc: Switch the full-screen mode when the function mode is used.

events.name: update:fullscreen
events.desc: Update the fullscreen attribute in component mode.
